title: Foundation of Our Platform
description: We started our journey with a small team of passionate educators dedicated to making quality education accessible for all.

title: Partnership with Leading Universities
description: Collaborated with top educational institutions to expand our course offerings and ensure high-quality learning materials.

title: Global Expansion
description: Expanded our platform globally, bringing tutors and learners together across 50+ countries and 100+ subjects.

title: Launch of AI-Powered Learning Tools
description: Introduced personalized learning experiences using AI to help students improve faster with tailor-made recommendations.
